resources.string:
We will guide you for the rest of the process

1. Take a picture
2. Make an agreement
3. File the claim

Please turn “Location” on for the convenience of the police. 

For your safety, please turn “Emergency Light” on. If at night, also turn “Outline Marker Lamps” and “Back Light” on at night. 

Remember to put a “Triangle Warning Sign” at the back of the car as well.
